item.title: Fiwix :: your small UNIX-like kernel
item.description: Just install the software and test it. If you encounter any error, please notify it. If you think there are some parts that could be improved, please share your ideas. Fiwix is an open source initiative and is released under the MIT License.

item.title: rewrite.md · GitHub
item.description: This may become a blog post or FAQ entry or something. For now, I'm just writing up something to answer the questions I've gotten about it! Scratch-rewriting a code base in a different language is usually considered a risky move that often leads to failure.
